---
title: mt4
tags: java

---

```java

package MorningTest;

import java.io.FileInputStream;
import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
import java.io.FileOutputStream;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.PrintStream;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class mt4 {

	public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		//1.배열객체 만들기
		
		
		DataOutputStream();
		
		int[][] map = new int[3][5];
		char[][] board = new char[6][10];
			
		
		//2번 파일 불러오기
		DataInputStream(map);
		
		
		//4번
			BoardDraw(map, board);
			
			
				
			
	}
	
	private static void DataOutputStream() throws IOException {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		FileOutputStream fos = new FileOutputStream("res\\map.txt");
		PrintStream out = new PrintStream(fos);
		
		out.println("00010");
		out.println("01000");
		out.println("00000");
		out.close();
		fos.close();
		
	
	}
	

 
 	static void DataInputStream(int[][] map) throws IOException {

		FileInputStream fis = new FileInputStream("res\\map.txt");
		Scanner scan = new Scanner(fis);

		String[] line = new String[3];
		for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
			line[i] = scan.nextLine();
		}
		String[][] temp = new String[3][];


		for (int j = 0; j < 5; j++)
			for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
				temp[i] = line[i].split("");
				map[i][j] = Integer.parseInt(temp[i][j]);
			}
		scan.close();;
		fis.close();
		
		for(int i = 0; i<3; i++) {
			for(int j = 0; j<5; j++) 
				System.out.printf("%d", map[i][j]);
				System.out.println();
		}
		System.out.println("map 데이터 로드완료");
		
	}

	static void BoardDraw(int[][] map, char[][] board) { 
		for(int j =0; j<5; j++) {
			for(int i =0; i<3; i++) {
				if(map[i][j] == 0) {													
				board[2*i][2*j] = '┌';
				board[2*i][2*j+1]= '┐';
				board[2*i+1][2*j] = '└';
				board[2*i+1][2*j+1] = '┘';}
			else {
				board[2*i][2*j] = '▩';
				board[2*i][2*j+1]= '▩';
				board[2*i+1][2*j] = '▩';
				board[2*i+1][2*j+1] = '▩';}
				}
			}
		
		System.out.println("board 그리기 완료");
		
		for(int i = 0; i<6; i++) {
			for(int j = 0; j<10; j++) 
				System.out.printf("%c", board[i][j]);
				System.out.println();
		}
	}
}


		
	
	






```
